channel.title: Batch
channel.description:
Hey MoparScape,
[code=bash]@echo off TITLE SkyRune Source - Deleting... del *.class pause[/code]
I am trying to delete all the .class files from all folders. That only deletes all files in the same folder as the bash file is and not all files. How can I make it delete all files in any folders in the folder SkyRune Source.

item.title: Batch
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

[quote=“Skyro, post:1, topic:449958”]Hey MoparScape,

@echo off TITLE SkyRune Source - Deleting... del *.class pause

I am trying to delete all the .class files from all folders. That only deletes all files in the same folder as the bash file is and not all files. How can I make it delete all files in any folders in the folder SkyRune Source.[/quote]@echo off TITLE SkyRune Source - Deleting... del *.class other/*.class another/*.class pause

Add in other directories as so ^.

Read full topic

item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

because I asked for it.

item.title: Batch
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

Skyro:

@Silab, I don’t want to do that though… And why were you demoted?

then don’t be stupid…

@echo off
TITLE SkyRune Source - Deleting...
cd c:/THE/FILE/PATH/WITH/THE/CLASS/FILES/YOU/WANT/TO/DELETE
del *.class
pause

P.S. CD is short for CHANGE DIRECTORY

Read full topic

item.title: Batch
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

@echo off
TITLE SkyRune Source - Deleting...
del *.class
pause

just place in the same folder as the files you want to delete and run.

Read full topic

item.description:
